article_title: Microsoft to Cut Up to 18,000 Jobs
article_text:
Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Satya Nadella recently pledged to be "bold and ambitious" to remake the company and its culture. The first task, he signaled in a memo on Thursday, would be cleaning up some of his predecessors' messes.

The recently named Microsoft chief is cutting up to 18,000 jobs in the next year, or about 14% of the company's workforce, the largest layoffs in its history. About two-thirds of the cuts...

twitter.description: Microsoft said it plans to eliminate up to 18,000 jobs and take charges of up to $1.6 billion over the next year to streamline its operations following the recent acquisition of Nokia's devices and services business.
twitter.title: Microsoft to Cut Up to 18,000 Jobs

image.alt: Microsoft to cut up to 18,000 jobs

twitter.creator: @ShiraOvide
